ygData.subject: Harmony, clarity for druids?
ygData.msgSnippet: One of my friends told me that he read somewhere that if a druid casts harmony on themselves before medding, the mana will go up faster, sort of like clarity
ygData.messageBody:
One of my friends told me that he read somewhere
that if a druid casts harmony on themselves before
medding, the mana will go up faster, sort of like clarity
does. I've tried it and it does seem to go up alot
faster, but I'm not sure if this is just wishfull
thinking hehe. Does anyone know anything about this? I
guess i could time it, but that would be to easy :
P<br>Iridia 24 druid<br>"Flame of the Phoenix"<br>Tarew Marr
